__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekday evening DFON -> Keypad backlight 120",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "Boost backlight when user fast-ons a keypad on weekday evenings and persist the change",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "2B AA BD 4", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "2B AA BD 5", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "2B AA BD 6", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "18:00", "to": { "time": "22:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "2B AA BD 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 120, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "2B AA BD 4", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "2B AA BD 5", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 120, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "2B AA BD 5", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "2B AA BD 6", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 120, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "2B AA BD 6", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Detect DFON (COC) events from any of the three keypads during weekday evenings; set each keypad's Backlight (BL) to 120 and call WDU to write/persist the change. Actions include each keypad to cover which one fired the control event." 
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
